Name: Chukka
Languages: understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait
Traits: Ambusher. In the first round of a combat, Chukka has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised. Mimicry. Chukka can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.
Actions: Silvered Pike. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.
